data.base_url_description: Enter the base URL for the Sensus Analytics API (e.g., https://api.sensus.com).
data.account_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics account (customer) number.
data.electric_meter_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics electric meter number.
data.electric_unit_type_description: Select the unit type. 'kWh' stands for kilowatt hours.
data.electric_commodity_price_description: Enter the price per kWh for electricity (e.g., 0.1413).
data.electric_solar_credit_price_description: Enter the price per kWh for solar electric returned to grid (e.g., -0.0872). Leave blank if not applicable.
data.electric_service_fee_description: Enter the fixed electric service fee amount (e.g., 12.60).

data.base_url_description: Enter the base URL for the Sensus Analytics API (e.g., https://api.sensus.com).
data.account_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics account (customer) number.
data.electric_meter_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics electric meter number.
data.electric_unit_type_description: Select the unit type. 'kWh' stands for kilowatt hours.
data.electric_commodity_price_description: Enter the price per kWh for electricity (e.g., 0.1413).
data.electric_solar_credit_price_description: Enter the price per kWh for solar electric returned to grid (e.g., -0.0872). Leave blank if not applicable.
data.electric_service_fee_description: Enter the fixed electric service fee amount (e.g., 12.60).

sensus_analytics_meter_address.name: Meter Address
sensus_analytics_meter_address.description: Street address of the utility meter.

sensus_analytics_last_read.name: Last Read
sensus_analytics_last_read.description: Timestamp of the last meter reading.

sensus_analytics_meter_latitude.name: Meter Latitude
sensus_analytics_meter_latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the meter's location.

sensus_analytics_meter_longitude.name: Meter Longitude
sensus_analytics_meter_longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the meter's location.

sensus_analytics_last_hour_timestamp.name: Last Hour Timestamp
sensus_analytics_last_hour_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last hour's data from the previous day.

sensus_analytics_electric_usage_unit.name: Electric Usage Unit
sensus_analytics_electric_usage_unit.description: Electric native unit of measurement chosen by Sensus Analytics.

sensus_analytics_electric_meter_id.name: Electric Meter ID
sensus_analytics_electric_meter_id.description: Unique identifier for the electric meter.

sensus_analytics_electric_latest_read_us.name: Latest Read Electric Usage
sensus_analytics_electric_latest_read_us.description: Latest cumulative electric usage recorded by the meter.

sensus_analytics_electric_billing_usage.name: Billing Electric Usage
sensus_analytics_electric_billing_usage.description: Total electric usage amount that has been billed.

sensus_analytics_electric_billing_cost.name: Electric Billing Cost
sensus_analytics_electric_billing_cost.description: Total cost of the billed electric usage.

sensus_analytics_electric_daily_fee.name: Electric Daily Fee
sensus_analytics_electric_daily_fee.description: Daily fee based on electric usage.

sensus_analytics_electric_last_hour_usag.name: Last Hour Electric Usage
sensus_analytics_electric_last_hour_usag.description: Electric usage for the last hour.

sensus_analytics_electric_meter_odometer.name: Electric Meter Odometer
sensus_analytics_electric_meter_odometer.description: Total cumulative electric usage recorded by the meter.

sensus_analytics_electric_hourly_timesta.name: Electric Hourly Timestamp
sensus_analytics_electric_hourly_timesta.description: Timestamp of the last hour's data from the previous day.
